General.Name: Western Gold Co Ltd
General.Description: Western Region Gold Co., Ltd. engages in the gold mining, dressing, and smelting business in Northwest China. It is also involved in mining chromium ore and iron ore. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Ürümqi, China.
General.Address: Urumqi Eco & Tech Dev Zn, Ürümqi, China, 830023
